channel.title: || iTavern - Enjoy the little things ||
channel.description:
[CENTER]I'll be improving this thread tomorrow.
Client - Working cursor system (WebClient/Desktop Client) - New/Custom interfaces - New scrollbar - Mouse scrolling system (Chatbox/Interfaces/Bank can be scrolled using the mouse scroll wheel) - New friends/ignore tab interfaces - Fixed memleaks - Less memory usage - Improved EXP Counter - New alert system
Server - Fixed a lot of dupes - Fixed deadlocks - Fixed memleaks - Perfect money pouch system - Extremely stable
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042726/runescape/images/5/51/Attack-icon.png[/img]Melee + Correct special attacks on all weapons. + Perfected Dragon Claw special attack. + Correct level requirements on all weapons. + Player poisoning which can be healed with a potion. + Player poisoning which fades away over a period of time. + Hitpoints orb turns green when player is poisoned. + Clipped Combat Following. + Constitution. + Combat icons in front of the hitsplat. + Equipment bonus's and affects: Barrows, Void, etc. + Critical hitmarks with the correct fonts, etc.
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043145/runescape/images/7/72/Ranged-icon.png[/img]Range + Projectiles. (Obsidian rings, darts, knifes, thrown-axe's, etc) + Hand Cannon with RuneScape's maxhit formula. + Correct level requirements for bows and arrows. + Perfected Dark bow, not overpowered. + Crystal bow degrading. + Use of red chinchompa's. + Special attacks on (e) bolts. + Ava's accumulator fully functional.
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043125/runescape/images/7/77/Magic-icon.png[/img]Magic + Perfected modern spellbook + Correct animations for each type of spell casted. + Correct RuneScape Teleporting + Flawless 'Ancients' spellbook. + Autocasting on Ancients and Modern spellbooks. + Korasi Special Attack (With Magic, Both PvM & PvP) + Perfect Miasmic Ancient spells.
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091215022527/runescape/images/2/24/Prayer-icon.png[/img]Prayer + Bone burying: Bones, Big bones, Dragon bones, Frost dragon bones + Working Guilded Alter with double XP if bones are used on it. + Reasonable drain rates. + Ancient Curses with working protect item, leeches, soul split, and turmoil. + Working Bonecrusher. + Quick Prayers: Normal and Curses
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/e/e3/Summoning-icon.png[/img]Summoning + Working 'Familiar Inventory'(with current Runescape Interfaces) + Your Summoned NPC works in multi-combat areas (Both player and NPC). + Pouch crafting with the correct level, amount of charms, shards, and materials.(with current Runescape Interfaces) + Summon drains overtime with your Familar spawned. + Summoning Orb. + Special attacks on all Familiars.
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053740/runescape/images/6/64/Runecrafting-icon.png[/img]RuneCrafting + Requires rune and/or pure essence for selected runes. + Crafting: Air, Mind, Water, Earth, Fire, Body, Cosmic, Nature, Law, Death, Blood, Astral + Teleports to the Alter for every rune.
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/f/f3/Thieving-icon.png[/img]Thieving + Pickpocketing and stall thieving. + Stealing items from stalls, randomly getting caught removing 4-6 HP. + Various items such as rings, fish, cakes, in stalls instead of coins. + NPC's catch you stealing from them and attack you. + Level affects how often you get caught.
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101104013322/runescape/images/8/84/Agility-icon.png[/img]Agility + Fully working Gnome Stronghold Agility Course. + Fully Working Wilderness Agility Course. + Fully working ticket exchange for Agile Armour.
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103053743/runescape/images/4/48/Crafting-icon.png[/img]Crafting + Stringing amulets + Crafting gems into cut gems + Make 'x' option.
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101017212730/runescape/images/f/f1/Herblore-icon.png[/img]Herblore + Perfect vial filling with water. + Working potions and unfinished potions. + Pect potion mixing. + Perfect drinking of potions and stat boosting. + Potion mixing to make extremes and overloads.
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img]Fletching + Make 'x' option + Arrow shaft, shortbow, longbow cutting. + Arrow making (feather + shaft = headless arrow, headless arrow + arrowtip = arrow). + Bow stringing. + Crossbow and bolt supported.
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20101103032422/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img]Slayer + Kuradel gives Slayer Tasks: 'easy' 'advanced' 'master' + Slayer tasks based on your combat level. + Slayer Tower, set up like real RuneScape. + Various bosses such as Jad and King Black Dragon assigned as Slayer Tasks. + Various monster's with different XP rates to level the Slayer skill.
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110427023661/runescape/images/8/83/Hunter-icon.png[/img]Hunter + All hunter gear with the correct level requirements to wield. + Impling capturing and looting. + Box traps for red and grey chinchompas. + Use of butterfly nets. + Capturing butterfly's in their jar.
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044857/runescape/images/2/28/Mining-icon.png[/img]Mining + Ore prospecting on all mining rocks. + Better pickaxes as well as higher mining levels affect Mining rates. + Various respawn delays on higher level rocks. + Gems found randomly whilst mining. + Dragon pickaxe support with the correct item animation and GFx. + Living mineral mining.
[IMG]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205044858/runescape/images/d/df/Smithing-icon.png[/img]Smithing + Perfect bar smelting using bar selection interface. + Make all option fixed with a delayed timer along with animation. + Perfected item and level requirement upon smithing certain bars. + Dragonfire shield making. + Dragon platebody making.
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/0/0b/Fishing-icon.png[/img]Fishing + All fish may be caught in their correct location with the correct equipment. + Nets fully functional. + Lobster cages fully functional. + Harpoons fully functional. + Fly fishing and bait fishing fully functional. + Level affects what you catch and the rate at which it is caught. + Fishing rocktail. + Living mineral bait. + Barbarian fishing at level 96.
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043728/runescape/images/f/f7/Cooking-icon.png[/img]Cooking + Cook-able foods can be cooked on a fire or range. + Food burning based on our cooking level. + Food cooking with the correct animation and timer between each item of food. + Cooking gauntlets reduce burn rate. + Finished all cooking level requirements.
[IMG]http://images2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091205043729/runescape/images/6/6d/Firemaking-icon.png[/img]FireMaking + All logs have proper requirements to be lit. + All logs may be burned. + All players can see fires. + Fairly fast XP rate (Doesn't produce money) + Clipped Firemaking
[IMG]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200718/runescape/images/0/0f/Woodcutting-icon.png[/img]WoodCutting + All trees working. + Randomized tree respawn. + Better hatchets increase the rate you get logs. + Correct hatchet level requirements. + Random chance at getting a bird's nest containing various seeds or summoning pets (Hawks, Raven's, etc)
[IMG]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20091231200717/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img]Farming + Proper Farming formula and procedures used to fulfill farming tasks. + All farming tools must be used with each corresponding task. + Timer on how often your seed grows a plant. (Shortest 5 minutes, longest 65 minutes.) + Crops getting diseases. + Growing of Herbs, Flowers, and Vegetables.[/CENTER]
[CENTER]Videos [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KUL7D43-288&list=LLJesVY6fCMTjvuHjqVi-jXg&feature=mh_lolz]Cursor system (Watch in 480p![/URL] [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Uq7v-wCu48A&feature=plcp]New starter interface (Watch in 480p!)[/URL]
[IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh556/Core006/100px-Clue_detail-1.png[/img]Interfaces [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cMTbC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cMTbC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KF9u4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SsadH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4aeL9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cg2Gt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rvJsW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G1wZf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh556/Core006/World_map_icon.png[/img]Server | Client [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aNU1h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CNfLH.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MTsWL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VeHmk.png[/img][/CENTER]
Evan! ~NightFuryX

item.title: || iTavern - Enjoy the little things ||
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

[CENTER]I’ll be improving this thread tomorrow.

Client

  • Working cursor system (WebClient/Desktop Client)
  • New/Custom interfaces
  • New scrollbar
  • Mouse scrolling system (Chatbox/Interfaces/Bank can be scrolled using the mouse scroll wheel)
  • New friends/ignore tab interfaces
  • Fixed memleaks
  • Less memory usage
  • Improved EXP Counter
  • New alert system

Server

  • Fixed a lot of dupes
  • Fixed deadlocks
  • Fixed memleaks
  • Perfect money pouch system
  • Extremely stable

Melee

  • Correct special attacks on all weapons.
  • Perfected Dragon Claw special attack.
  • Correct level requirements on all weapons.
  • Player poisoning which can be healed with a potion.
  • Player poisoning which fades away over a period of time.
  • Hitpoints orb turns green when player is poisoned.
  • Clipped Combat Following.
  • Constitution.
  • Combat icons in front of the hitsplat.
  • Equipment bonus’s and affects: Barrows, Void, etc.
  • Critical hitmarks with the correct fonts, etc.

Range

  • Projectiles. (Obsidian rings, darts, knifes, thrown-axe’s, etc)
  • Hand Cannon with RuneScape’s maxhit formula.
  • Correct level requirements for bows and arrows.
  • Perfected Dark bow, not overpowered.
  • Crystal bow degrading.
  • Use of red chinchompa’s.
  • Special attacks on (e) bolts.
  • Ava’s accumulator fully functional.

Magic

  • Perfected modern spellbook
  • Correct animations for each type of spell casted.
  • Correct RuneScape Teleporting
  • Flawless ‘Ancients’ spellbook.
  • Autocasting on Ancients and Modern spellbooks.
  • Korasi Special Attack (With Magic, Both PvM & PvP)
  • Perfect Miasmic Ancient spells.

Prayer

  • Bone burying: Bones, Big bones, Dragon bones, Frost dragon bones
  • Working Guilded Alter with double XP if bones are used on it.
  • Reasonable drain rates.
  • Ancient Curses with working protect item, leeches, soul split, and turmoil.
  • Working Bonecrusher.
  • Quick Prayers: Normal and Curses

Summoning

  • Working ‘Familiar Inventory’(with current Runescape Interfaces)
  • Your Summoned NPC works in multi-combat areas (Both player and NPC).
  • Pouch crafting with the correct level, amount of charms, shards, and materials.(with current Runescape Interfaces)
  • Summon drains overtime with your Familar spawned.
  • Summoning Orb.
  • Special attacks on all Familiars.

RuneCrafting

  • Requires rune and/or pure essence for selected runes.
  • Crafting: Air, Mind, Water, Earth, Fire, Body, Cosmic, Nature, Law, Death, Blood, Astral
  • Teleports to the Alter for every rune.

Thieving

  • Pickpocketing and stall thieving.
  • Stealing items from stalls, randomly getting caught removing 4-6 HP.
  • Various items such as rings, fish, cakes, in stalls instead of coins.
  • NPC’s catch you stealing from them and attack you.
  • Level affects how often you get caught.

Agility

  • Fully working Gnome Stronghold Agility Course.
  • Fully Working Wilderness Agility Course.
  • Fully working ticket exchange for Agile Armour.

Crafting

  • Stringing amulets
  • Crafting gems into cut gems
  • Make ‘x’ option.

Herblore

  • Perfect vial filling with water.
  • Working potions and unfinished potions.
  • Pect potion mixing.
  • Perfect drinking of potions and stat boosting.
  • Potion mixing to make extremes and overloads.

Fletching

  • Make ‘x’ option
  • Arrow shaft, shortbow, longbow cutting.
  • Arrow making (feather + shaft = headless arrow, headless arrow + arrowtip = arrow).
  • Bow stringing.
  • Crossbow and bolt supported.

Slayer

  • Kuradel gives Slayer Tasks: ‘easy’ ‘advanced’ ‘master’
  • Slayer tasks based on your combat level.
  • Slayer Tower, set up like real RuneScape.
  • Various bosses such as Jad and King Black Dragon assigned as Slayer Tasks.
  • Various monster’s with different XP rates to level the Slayer skill.

Hunter

  • All hunter gear with the correct level requirements to wield.
  • Impling capturing and looting.
  • Box traps for red and grey chinchompas.
  • Use of butterfly nets.
  • Capturing butterfly’s in their jar.

Mining

  • Ore prospecting on all mining rocks.
  • Better pickaxes as well as higher mining levels affect Mining rates.
  • Various respawn delays on higher level rocks.
  • Gems found randomly whilst mining.
  • Dragon pickaxe support with the correct item animation and GFx.
  • Living mineral mining.

Smithing

  • Perfect bar smelting using bar selection interface.
  • Make all option fixed with a delayed timer along with animation.
  • Perfected item and level requirement upon smithing certain bars.
  • Dragonfire shield making.
  • Dragon platebody making.

Fishing

  • All fish may be caught in their correct location with the correct equipment.
  • Nets fully functional.
  • Lobster cages fully functional.
  • Harpoons fully functional.
  • Fly fishing and bait fishing fully functional.
  • Level affects what you catch and the rate at which it is caught.
  • Fishing rocktail.
  • Living mineral bait.
  • Barbarian fishing at level 96.

Cooking

  • Cook-able foods can be cooked on a fire or range.
  • Food burning based on our cooking level.
  • Food cooking with the correct animation and timer between each item of food.
  • Cooking gauntlets reduce burn rate.
  • Finished all cooking level requirements.

FireMaking

  • All logs have proper requirements to be lit.
  • All logs may be burned.
  • All players can see fires.
  • Fairly fast XP rate (Doesn’t produce money)
  • Clipped Firemaking

WoodCutting

  • All trees working.
  • Randomized tree respawn.
  • Better hatchets increase the rate you get logs.
  • Correct hatchet level requirements.
  • Random chance at getting a bird’s nest containing various seeds or summoning pets (Hawks, Raven’s, etc)

Farming

  • Proper Farming formula and procedures used to fulfill farming tasks.
  • All farming tools must be used with each corresponding task.
  • Timer on how often your seed grows a plant. (Shortest 5 minutes, longest 65 minutes.)
  • Crops getting diseases.
  • Growing of Herbs, Flowers, and Vegetables.[/CENTER]

[CENTER]Videos
Cursor system (Watch in 480p!
New starter interface (Watch in 480p!)

Interfaces

cMTbC.png776×542

cMTbC.png776×542

KF9u4.png779×541

SsadH.png780×545

4aeL9.png781×539

cg2Gt.png784×540

rvJsW.png777×539

Server | Client

aNU1h.jpg781×541

CNfLH.png781×540


[/CENTER]

Evan! ~NightFuryX

Read full topic
